pages.title: Rumor (Swamp Monster)
pages.text: $(o)A long time ago, there was a predator in the depths of the Swamps.$(br2)$(o)Thanks to the power of necromancy, it is possible to summon this creature, but it will become hostile against its summoner.
$(o)To summon this creature, first you have to craft the Fossilt Bait.$(br2)Finally, you have to right click while you are holding this item on your hand.
